mapper.select: SELECT A.DISCOUNT_ID, A.USER_NAME, A.GAME_ID, A.TITLE, A.BACKGROUND_IMAGE, A.PRICE, A.SALE_PRICE, ROUND((1 - (A.SALE_PRICE / A.PRICE)) * 100, 2) AS DISCOUNT_PERCENT, A.RELEASED, A.ESRB_RATING, A.CREATED_AT, '' AS RESULT, (B.APPLICANTS - B.CURRENT_APPLICANTS) AS COUNT_APPLICANTS, B.IS_ACTIVE, -- 공동구매 신청자 목록 (콤마로 연결) ( SELECT LISTAGG(USER_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CREATED_AT) FROM GAME_GROUP_APPLICANT WHERE GAME_ID = A.GAME_ID ) AS APPLICANT_LIST FROM GAME_DISCOUNT A JOIN GAME_GROUP_PURCHASE B ON A.GAME_ID = B.GAME_ID WHERE A.PRICE > 0 AND A.SALE_PRICE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.TITLE OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY

{ CALL TOGGLE_GAME_DISCOUNT( #{userName, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameId, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{title, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backgroundImage, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{salePrice, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{released, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{esrbRating, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) }
